item.title: Why is it that my client will not load the "Open" option with this box set?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

Ok well i have this ahrims box set and i give it the “option” to “open” in the class 8 but when i run it with the option it freezes the client, but when i delete the option if “unfreezes” and shows the box set fine? whats the problem, please help!

}
if(i == 7501)
{
class8.aString170 = “Ahrim’s set”;
class8.aStringArray189[2] = “Open”; ----this is the option that is the problem for me >_<??
class8.aStringArray168 = null;
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.anInt174 = 14090;
class8.anInt165 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt202 = 0;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.anInt198 = 1795;
class8.anInt181 = 2414;
class8.anInt155 = 20;
class8.anInt200 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt169 = 6;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = -22;
class8.anInt179 = 11847;
class8.anInt190 = 199;
class8.aByteArray178 = “It’s a Barrows - ahrim’s set.”.getBytes();
